topic: 10. At the end of a formal technical review all attendees can decide to
options: accept the work product without modification
modify the work product and continue the review
reject the product due to stylistic discrepancies
reject the product due to severe errors
topic_cn: 10. 在一次正式的技术评审结束时，所有与会者可以决定
options_cn: 无修改地接受工作产品
修改工作产品并继续评审
因风格差异而拒绝该产品
因严重错误而拒绝该产品
